Text:
Ha ha. He is the grandfather to the present Swedish king Carl Gustav XVI Bernadotte.

This man Karl Edvard av Sachsen-Coburg-Gotha got a daughter Sibylla who married the Swedish nazi prince Gustav Adolf. They got five kids and among them was the boy Carl Gustav.

Then the prince Gustav Adolf died misteriously so he never  got to be king.

Carl XVI Gustav eventually became king and married Silvia Sommerlath, a daughter to a nazi entrepreneaur who fled to Brazil after the war. 

So Sweden got a nazis everywhere in our royal family! HA HA
